meanings.sent1: The passengers enplaned the plane before takeoff.
meanings.sent2: We enplaned the flight to our vacation destination.
meanings.sent3: The family enplaned the plane, but forgot their luggage!
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the passengers enplaned the plane, ready for their adventure.
meanings.sent5: The excited travelers enplaned the aircraft, eager for their journey.

meanings.definition: To put on board an airplane.
meanings.sent1: The crew enplaned the cargo carefully for the long flight.
meanings.sent2: They enplaned the supplies onto the aircraft for the mission.
meanings.sent3: The workers enplaned the equipment, making sure everything was secure.
meanings.sent4: The team enplaned the tools, ready for the construction project.
meanings.sent5: The staff enplaned the goods, ensuring they were safely loaded.
